The Independent Difference

Why choosing a private practice matters for your health.

Dr. Khatib's Practice

  • ‚úÖ You are the Boss: We answer to our patients, not corporate shareholders or insurance quotas.
  • ‚úÖ Continuity of Care: You see Dr. Khatib every visit, not a rotating roster of providers.

Corporate Clinics

  • ‚ùå Profit First: Decisions often driven by bottom-line metrics, not patient needs.
  • ‚ùå High Turnover: You might see a different provider every time you visit.
  • ‚ùå Rushed Visits: 15-minute slots that leave little time for questions.

Meet Dr. Nadim Khatib

Since 1998, Dr. Nadim Khatib has provided exceptional, personalized medical care to the Bullhead City community. Unlike high-volume clinics, our practice focuses on fostering meaningful, long-term doctor-patient relationships.
